entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-12-07
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • GeneratedRegex Attribute Failed to generate code and shows CS8795 error #79367
  • createdump fails to collect actionable dumps on macOS 13 Ventura #79355
    7.0.x
  • AutoMapper crashes on .NET 6 iOS MAUI application mapping IEnumerable properties #79354
    7.0.x
  • CultureInfo("nb-NO") not working correctly for iOS on .NET 7 #79347
    7.0.x
  • Are there any side effects about the warnings? #79344
  • [API Proposal]: Allow disabling cache for RSAKey class #79338
  • File.OpenHandle() limitations #79335
  • TimeSpan - Microseconds and Nanoseconds #79333
  • BadImageFormatException when invoking static abstract method through reflection #79331
    8.0.0
  • Crash in coreclr!WKS::gc_heap::make_unused_array #79327
    8.0.0
  • Crash in coreclr!ILCodeVersion::GetActiveNativeCodeVersion #79326
    8.0.0
  • Test failure readytorun/coreroot_determinism/coreroot_determinism/coreroot_determinism.sh #79320
  • Native AOT Testing in .NET 8 #79316
    8.0.0

Closed

  • Question for Service Release of Net 7 #79359
  • IndexOutOfRangeException when using compiled and ignorecase regex in .NET 7.0 #79298
    8.0.0
  • AsnEncodedData.Format return empty for CRL extension in Linux #79265
  • RSA.VerifyData terminates with "Out of memory." on Linux when passing an all-zero modulus #78293
  • [wasm] `Blazor scenarios` broken on `dotnet-runtime-perf` #79330
    8.0.0
  • RegexOptions.NonBacktracking missing matches with certain alternations involving non-nullable prefixes #79110
    8.0.0
  • Unloading NativeAOT compiled dll? #79348
  • [wasm] V8 crash with AOT for `System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript.Tests` #78972
    8.0.0
  • [Perf] Linux/x64: 4 Regressions on 10/14/2022 7:48:13 PM #78810
  • Bounds checks not removed in several cases #37167
    Future
  • Devirtualization issues in non-shared generics #37717
    Future
  • JIT should propagate assertions and elide custom (bounds) checks #44040
    Future
  • What exactly is the managed calling convention? #54796
    Future
  • Improve codegen for delegate cast / type check? #55841
    Future
  • Unrolled Vector128<T>.Count doesn't elide bounds check #61207
    8.0.0
  • Is there a way to tell SSLStreams to validate the remote certificate based on the certificate present in path rather than Windows keystore? #79266
    Future
  • Upper bound effect on unsafe indexing #61498
    Future
  • Test failure JIT/Regression/JitBlue/Runtime_76194/Runtime_76194/Runtime_76194.sh #79319
  • Logger name allocations from ILoggerFactory.CreateLogger<MyClass>() #79317
    Future
  • iOS & tvOS legs are failing to AOT System.Net.Http.Json #79279
  • Test failure tracing\\eventpipe\\bigevent\\bigevent\\bigevent.cmd #78001
    8.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix BN_is_zero for OpenSSL 1.0.2 non-portable build #79369
    area-System.Security
  • Fix Sse3 => Ssse3 typo #79368
    area-System.Memory, 8.0.0
  • Delete parts of type system that deal with layouts #79366
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [release/6.0] Fix dump creation on MacOS Ventura #79365
    Servicing-consider, area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 7.0.x
  • Add experimental Regex test based on SampleMatches #79364
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • Ensure that `TryGetContainableHWIntrinsicOp` is non-mutating #79363
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix declaration of local in regex source generator #79362
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • [release/7.0] Fix handling of backtracking stack with some loops #79361
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • [release/7.0] Fix dump creation on MacOS Ventura #79360
    Servicing-consider, area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 7.0.x
  • [release/7.0] [wasm] fix marshaling Error to C# as JSType.Any #79352
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 7.0.x
  • [release/7.0] [wasm] Catch error from loading "node:crypto" module #79351
    Servicing-consider, arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 7.0.x
  • Don't embed bitcode on tvOS anymore #79349
    area-Build-mono, community-contribution
  • JIT: experiment with early liveness and use it for forward sub and last-use copy elision #79346
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • * Registry.GetSubKeyNames : Remove List copy to Array #79345
    area-Microsoft.Win32, community-contribution
  • [mono][interp] Remove some dead opcodes #79343
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • JIT: Allow cloning addresses even before initobj #79341
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mono][aot] Optimize constrained calls made from gsharedvt methods. #79339
  • Allow Base64Decoder to ignore space chars, add IsValid methods and tests #79334
    area-System.Memory, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • improve SslStream exception after disposal #79329
    area-System.Net.Security
  • Wasm jiterpreter cleanup and bug fixes pt. 4 #79324
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • improve symlink handling in Ping #79323
    area-System.Net
  • Test ldp/stp optimization #79318
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Merged

  • Handle zero value modulus for OpenSSL 1.1 #79013
    area-System.Security
  • Fix dump creation on MacOS Ventura #79356
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Ignoring test regression runtime_63354 in x86 #79358
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Use static sealed vtable for dynamically created types #79332
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Use IndexOfAnyExceptInRange in ZipHelper.GetEncoding #79357
    area-System.IO.Compression
  • Fix handling of backtracking stack with some loops #79353
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, 8.0.0
  • Call BIO_gets in a loop until no more data can be read #79300
    area-System.Security
  • Fix a NonBacktracking subsumption checking rule for XY|X??Y #79163
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • Compile native code with `-ffunction-sections` #79322
    area-Infrastructure
  • [wasm] fix marshaling Error to C# as JSType.Any #79340
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • [Android] Fix path to `ping` on Android API 21-27 #79076
    area-System.Net, os-android
  • [mono] Convert Array icalls to use ObjectHandleOnStack. #77343
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • [mono][aot] Fix infinite recursion in the AOT dwarf emitter. #79310
  • Simplify MethodCell #79321
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Only allocate StringBuilder for complex type names #79325
    community-contribution
  • [mono][interp] Replace ldobj.vt + stobj.vt.noref pair with cpobj.vt.noref #79302
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • [JIT] X64 - Allow containment of larger memory operands for `AND`, `OR`, `XOR` #79126
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix test by actually passing the message and exception. #79307
    area-System.Diagnostics, community-contribution
  • CoreCLR initialization failures logging #78790
    area-VM-coreclr, 8.0.0

Updated

  • fix determin lib name varation logic #79370
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Don't use IlcPath in NativeAOT targets #79233
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • New ASCII APIs #75012
    area-System.Buffers, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • Enable the fundamentals behind libraries tests compiled via crossgen2 #75230
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [release/6.0] Workaround MacCatalyst .app output path change in cmake 3.25 #79098
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [release/7.0] Workaround MacCatalyst .app output path change in cmake 3.25 #79097
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Add MemoryExtensions.Split #79048
    area-System.Memory, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Remove span pinning associated with string.Create #78914
  • Use IndexOfAnyValues in the RegexCompiler and source gen #78927
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, 8.0.0
  • Implement unmanaged-to-managed direction for vtable stub generator #77130
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator
  • [Merge-on-Red] - Implement Test Process Watcher #78742
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Fixing assert on variable live range for simd12 LCL / STORE_LCL #79182
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix HTTP3 header decoder buffer allocation #78862
    area-System.Net.Http, community-contribution
  • [release/7.0][wasm] Add RollForward=Major for WasmAppHost . #79315
    Servicing-consider, arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 7.0.x
  • Experiment with changing the implementation strategy for RangeListMap #79021
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Stop producing and handling `ADDR` nodes #78246
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [wasm][debugger] Revert don't need to escape special characters anymore #78320
    area-Debugger-mono
  • Implement DivRem intrinsic for X86 #66551
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • [wasm] Lazy init of [JSExport] bindings #77293
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • CallSiteRuntimeResolver. VisitFactory method implements adding IsInstanceOfType check #79232
    area-Extensions-DependencyInjection, community-contribution, needs-author-action
  • Fix perf. regression caused by signed/unsigned comp #79137
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution
  • Split library and package Readme #78888
    area-Meta, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • [Android] Improvements to remote certificate verification in SslStream #77386
    area-System.Net.Security, os-android, 8.0.0
  • [draft][wasm] Memory snapshot #78915
    NO-MERGE, arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript
  • [wasm][debugger] Removing console.debug message helper to make debugger work. #72812
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono, 8.0.0
  • [NativeAOT] Enable smoke tests on macOS #76560
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Replace successive "ldr" and "str" instructions with "ldp" and "stp" #77540
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • WIP: Create AND chains in bool optimizer pass #79283
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [draft][wasi] compile with libs.native #79046
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 8.0.0
  • [release/7.0] [wasm] Add warning code to all warnings produced in WasmAppBuilder #79234
    Servicing-approved, arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 7.0.3
  • [WIP] Cloning files on OSX-like platforms when possible instead of copying the whole file #79243
    area-System.IO, os-mac-os-x, community-contribution
  • Fix thread-safety issues with enumerating ResourceManager. #75054
    area-System.Resources, community-contribution
  • [JIT] X64/ARM64 - `CAST` removals for small types on `ADD`, `SUB`, `MUL`, `AND`, `OR`, `XOR`, `NOT`, `NEG` #77874
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Mono musl support #76500
    area-Infrastructure-mono, community-contribution
  • Do not override content root with default #79242
    area-Extensions-Hosting
  • SP800-108 CTR HMAC #79120
    area-System.Security, new-api-needs-documentation
  • A gentle reminder that TraceGC is turned off #79183
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Move the rearrange_uoh_segments call earlier so that distribute_free_regions can take them into account #79262
    area-GC-coreclr

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-12-07
entry.content:
PullRequests

Merged

  • Add some simple perf tests comparing deep await chains to deep green thread waits #2108

Updated

  • NativeAOT-LLVM: Merge to 17/12/21 #2101

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-12-07
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Convert all DotnetCommand tests that call "new" to DotnetNewCommand #29438
  • Tracking epic for key .net tools bugs #29436
    Backlog
  • dotnet watch run is not work #29424
  • .NET 7 - Internal CLR error (0x80131506) in dotnet ef cli #29423

Closed

  • No help for specific `dotnet nuget` commands #27833
  • dotnet publish won't publish self contained exe without a RuntimeIdentifier. I am passing -r in the command. #10566
  • Why Platform Target? #29129
  • NETSDK1147 only lists the first missing workload #23444
    7.0.1xx
  • Allow `dotnet workload list --machine-readable` to work with prior SDK versions #24254
    7.0.1xx
  • SDK workload improvements #23355
    7.0.1xx
  • ObjectDisposedException when running dotnet workload uninstall #23667
    7.0.1xx
  • Enable workload infrastructure to support multitargeting workloads #23951
    7.0.1xx
  • Update Workload creation to version by preview to take advantage of #22446 #23373
    7.0.1xx
  • Automate the drop creation and insertion process for runtime and wasm workloads #23384
  • Figure out relationship between Directory.Build.targets and workloads #15505
    7.0.1xx
  • Enable dependabot in the SDK repo to keep dependencies up to date #22994
    7.0.1xx
  • `dotnet run` shouldn't report usage when the build itself fails #24842
    7.0.1xx
  • Update SDK tests to supported TFM's #16292
    6.0.4xx
  • Allow "dotnet workload update --print-download-link-only --sdk-version" to work with prior SDK versions #24335
    6.0.4xx

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix bad merge that incorrectly didn't exclude some packages #29435
    Area-NetSDK
  • Bump Newtonsoft.Json from 13.0.1 to 13.0.2 in /src/Assets/TestProjects/PortableToolWithTestProject/App #29433
    Area-Infrastructure, dependencies
  • Bump Newtonsoft.Json from 13.0.1 to 13.0.2 in /src/Assets/TestProjects/PortableTool #29432
    Area-Infrastructure, dependencies

Merged

  • dotnet nuget commands show correct help text #29266
    Area-CLI
  • Remove unnecessary sources from the test used nuget.config file to reduce 429s #29371
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Import the Container Build package from WebSDK #28845
    Area-WebSDK
  • Add option for specifying the version of machine-readable output of dotnet list package command #29367
    Area-Infrastructure

Updated

  • Change the cppcli tests to use the package reference support #29369
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Update minimum msbuild to 17.4 #29416
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Ensure case-insensitive web.config file name is used #14854
    Area-WebSDK, 8.0.1xx
  • Update Test project TestAppEchoDotnetRoot to current framework #22784
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Update the target framework for the test projects #25479
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Try not building the test assets and see what happens #29376
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Add net8.0 ILCompiler tests #29393
    Area-ILLink
  • Add base class for all test classes using WatchableApp. #29258
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Add support for default values of methods parameters in the GenAPI. #29356
    Area-GenAPI
  • extract common logging functionality into ApiSymbolExtensions #29379
    Area-ApiCompat, Area-GenAPI
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.2xx' => 'main' #29397
    Area-Infrastructure

Updated

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-12-07
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Automating nullable enable over thousands of csproj #65852
  • GeneratedRegex Attribute Failed to generate code and shows CS8795 error #65850
  • Debug assertion failure in PerAnalyzerState.TryStartSyntaxAnalysis #65849
  • Quick Info tests fail when using new editor package versions #65840
  • RegexDocumentHighlighter.GetReferences throws when editing regex inside a raw string #65836
  • The `SyntaxGenerator` class omits `this` keyword for extension methods #65835
  • The `DeclarationModifiers` class does not properly handle `readonly` keyword for `struct` \s #65834
  • The `SyntaxGenerator` does not generate implicit conversion operators #65833
  • Integration tests fail with "VSIX installer failed...Unable to find the specified file." #65824

Closed

  • Cursor is not changed to "normal" when over new rename UI panel #64677
    17.5 P1
  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build main-33207.93 #65841
  • Review all the non-infra changes in #65737 #65746
  • Visual Studio reports "Feature 'Diagnostic analyzer runner' is currently unavailable due to an internal error" as a result of AnalyzerExecutor.ExecuteBlockActionsCore calling Enumerable.Cast( null ) #65837
  • Semantic Snippets - Property Snippet #62604
    17.4
  • Semantic Snippets - Class Snippet #62605
    17.4
  • Semantic Snippets - Struct Snippet #62606
    17.4
  • Semantic Snippets - Interface Snippet #62607
    17.4
  • Semantic Snippets - Constructor Snippet #62608
    17.4
  • `GenerateDeconstructMethodCodeFixProvider` should support positional patterns #65612
  • Why is the name of local variables automatically modified? #65827

PullRequests

Created

  • Removed 'AnalyzerOptions' reference related to 'AdditionalFiles' #65851
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Remove mutable state from rename #65848
    Area-IDE
  • Add ExecuteCommandAsync overloads which accept arguments #65847
    Area-IDE
  • Switch to non-preview queue to use 17.4.1 instead of 17.4 Preview 5 #65846
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Simplify codegen for is-expressions #65845
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Merge release/dev17.4 to release/dev17.5 #65843
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Remove code for cloning compilations for skeleton references #65842
    Area-IDE
  • Upgrade to .net 7 release version #65839
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Fix Regex features in raw-string-literals. #65838
    Area-IDE
  • Avoid emitting redundant locals in deconstruction assignment #65832
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Add experimental API #65831
    Area-Compilers
  • Enable CA1052 (static holder types should be static) #65830
    Area-Infrastructure, Community
  • Make `SymbolAnnotation` static #65829
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Log ServiceHub process exit code on failure #65823
    Area-IDE
  • Merge main to features/SharedSyntaxTrees #65822
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge

Merged

  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #65795
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Create DkmCustomUIVisualizerInfo instances with ExtensionPartId field #65730
    Area-Interactive, Community, Next
  • Merge main to release/dev17.6 #65844
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • [LSP] Use lower logging level for verbose messages #65819
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Force arrow cursor for inline rename flayout #65783
    Area-IDE, Community, Next
  • Port "Incremental generator nodes must run when no result history" to 17.4 #65781
    Area-Compilers
  • Merge release/dev17.5 to main #65825
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Remove dotnet5 feed #65742
    Area-Infrastructure, Community, Next
  • Add 17.6 branch to config #65821
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.5-vs-deps to main-vs-deps #65828
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Adding support for positional patterns to GenerateDeconstructMethodFixProvider.cs #65748
    Area-IDE, Community, Next
  • Cleanup unused generated code #65723
    Area-Compilers, Community, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.5 to release/dev17.5-vs-deps #65826
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Simplify WeaklyCachedRecoverableValueSource #65717
    Area-IDE
  • Ensure we recompute top level semantic versions, even when making frozen documents #65820
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.4 to release/dev17.5 #65786
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Skip tests on 32bit debug due to messagepack issue #65817
    Area-IDE, Next

Updated

  • Delete Compilers.sln and keep only Compilers.slnf #65802
    Area-Infrastructure, Community
  • Fix inline rename in MAUI #65818
    Area-IDE
  • Stop referencing packages that became inbox on modern .NET. #65810
    Area-Infrastructure, Community
  • Atomically update all linked files in a solution snapshot when one of them is updated. #65816
    Area-IDE
  • Move classification tests to new framework #65734
    Area-IDE
  • Is pattern expression with in parameter avoid unnecessary temp in rewriter #65243
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Support semantic tokens output in LSIF generator #65548
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Move off of the final usage of an uncached AsyncLazy #65780
    Area-IDE
  • Ensure lvalue struct receivers are not copied by value implicit Range indexer rewrite #65805
    Area-Compilers
  • Cleanup `SyntaxNormalizerTests` #65516
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Add option to enable/disable document outline and disable by default #65688
    Area-IDE, OnDeckForServicing
  • Emit `DecimalConstantAttribute` for synthesized delegates #65777
    Area-Compilers
  • Allow optional and `params` parameters in synthesized delegate templates #65582
    Area-Compilers
  • Move to more consistent patterns in the parser. #65724
    Area-Compilers
  • Fix wrong symbol comparisons #65430
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Refactor snippets #65811
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Deprecate public constructors of various diagnostic analysis context types #64083
    Area-Analyzers, Area-Compilers
  • Split out ref safety analysis into a separate pass after binding #64928
    Area-Compilers
  • Avoid reporting ref safety errors for discard assignments #65693
    Area-Compilers
  • WIP: Always cache our lazy values. #65719
    Area-IDE
  • reduce the amount of time that we switch from a background thread to … #65641
    Area-IDE

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-12-07
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • POST without Content-Length - 411 Length required #45495
  • Blazor WASM with MSAL auth in Safari throws System.Net.Http.HttpRequestException: TypeError: Load failed #45494
  • .NET 6 AmbiguousMatchException Mixed Technology App #45493
  • Update TFM to net8.0 #45492
    8.0-preview1
  • Hosting bundle downgrade error when 6.0.11 exists #45491
  • Perf improvement: https, plaintext #45490
  • Perf regression: endpoint, mvc #45485
  • _blazor websocket error #45484
  • Force use of https on NavigationManager #45483

Closed

  • Kestrel stops listening/responding to requests after some time (only after updating to .NET 7.0) #45215
  • Question : Should Microsoft.AspNetCore.Diagnostics.HealthChecks extension respond success to HTTP PUT/POST/DELETE methods ? #45258
  • Route tooling broke source-build #42927
  • Perf improvement: json #45481
  • Unstated build dependency for e2e tests + tests won't run #41408
  • IL2070 error when building in source-build #43253
  • CA1825 error when building in source-build #43461
  • IDE0060 error when building in source-build #43462
  • Blazor WASM/Server cannot read video with transparent channel on Safari IOS #45487
  • Referenced Razor Class Library Component Reporting Error RZ10012 #45427
  • Calling Javascript interop from inside OnAfterRenderAsync throw exception #45489
  • ControllerLinkGeneratorExtensions throw ArgumentException #43845
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Analyzers: Cache route usage model and reuse in RouteHandlerAnalyzer #45486
    area-infrastructure, area-web-frameworks

Merged

  • [Hosting] Add {OriginalFormat} to start & stop log state objects #45253
    area-runtime, community-contribution, 8.0-preview1
  • Fix SignInAsync docs to reference DefaultSignInScheme #45488
    area-runtime, community-contribution, 8.0-preview1
  • [main] Use non-localized 8.0.x links in installer #45412
    area-infrastructure, feature-installers, feature-localization, 8.0-preview1
  • Cleanup Mvc Analyzers #42754
    community-contribution, area-web-frameworks, 8.0-preview1
  • Fix scheme nullability in link generation methods #45467
    area-mvc, community-contribution, 8.0-preview1
  • Remove allocation of logger name from constructor of Renderer #45480
    area-blazor, 8.0-preview1
  • gRPC JSON transcoding: Resolve all descriptors from registry #45436
    area-grpc, 8.0-preview1

Updated

  • CreatedResult should accept null location #42576
    community-contribution, area-web-frameworks
  • fix trace id value, introduce traceparent #44680
    community-contribution, area-web-frameworks
  • Remove 'max-age' in 'Cache-Control' Response Header when Location is None ('no-cache'). #42706
    community-contribution, area-web-frameworks
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 1159: Build ID 2062418 #44686
    area-infrastructure
  • Code analyzer to detect if route parameters are parsable #45286
    area-infrastructure
  • Bump SDK to 8.0.100-alpha.1.22606.10 #44925
    area-infrastructure
  • Add Kestrel named pipes transport #44426
    area-runtime, blog-candidate

entry.title: dotnet/diagnostics - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-12-07
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Histogram/UpDownCounter counters are not shown when running `dotnet counters` tool #3542

Closed

  • Provide a convenient way to collect dumps using dotnet-dump when the process is not garbage collecting #3503
    8.0.0

PullRequests

Merged

  • [Dotnet Monitor] Revert To Logging a single payload (not a list) #3538

Updated

  • Update docker images to latest tags #3535
  • Search for the diagnostics socket in the mount NS of the target process #3539

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-12-07
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Fix the rest of the Color validating tests #11948
    Backlog
  • Button "normal" visual state not being correctly applied upon release of button #11947
  • Content not render while using ContentPresenter in DataTemplate #11928
    Backlog
  • Laggy Scroll when Binding Image to url or stream. (FLEX LAYOUT) #11917
  • Add PlatformViewFactory to ElementHandler #11916
    Backlog

Closed

  • [Proposal] Remove net7.0 from maui class library template or provide better support for net7.0 inside our single project targets #11839
  • Could not deploy iOS app from VS for Mac stable version #11752
  • Mac Catalyst Binding Library not callable #11890

PullRequests

Created

  • Prepare MAUI to support building with NuGets #11946
  • Have easy way to set initial BlazorWebView URL #11942
    area/blazor 🕸️

    area/docs 📓, t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • Update Essentials Launcher API Docs #11932
    area/docs 📓, t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • [Android] Fix clipped text in SwipeItem under some DPIs #11931
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, control-swipeview
  • Update Essentials HapticFeedback API Docs #11930
    area/docs 📓, t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • Bump Xamarin.Firebase.AppIndexing from 120.0.0.9 to 120.0.0.10 #11929
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • [iOS] Fix crash typing in Shell SearchHandler #11927
    t/bug, platform/iOS 🍎, area/shell 🐢, version/ios-16
  • [macOS] Fix crash using Shell SearchHandler on Catalyst #11926
    t/bug, platform/macOS 🍏, area/shell 🐢
  • Update Essentials Gyroscope API Docs #11925
    area/docs 📓, t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • Update Essentials Geolocation API Docs #11924
    area/docs 📓, t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • Update Essentials Geocoding Docs #11921
    area/docs 📓, t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • Update Essentials Flashlight API Docs #11920
    area/docs 📓, t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • Update Essentials FileSystem API Docs #11919
    area/docs 📓, t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • [iOS] Fix Entry Next Keyboard Button Finds Next TextField #11914
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-entry, .NET 7 + Servicing

Merged

  • Fix UpdateSemantics for UIStepper and UIPagerControl #11937
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/controls 🎮
  • Update version #11939
  • Stable 6.0.5xx-sr9 version #11935
  • Remove non platform TFM and sync up SupportedOSPlatformVersion #11910

Updated

  • Generate unique filenames for iOS splash screens #10812
    area/single project ☝️
  • Add missing await call for color match test #11016
    area/controls 🎮
  • Make inline video / picture in picture enabled by default on WebView for iOS #11075
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-webview
  • Make MAUI into 1 workload and lots of NuGets instead of a full workload #11206
    area/setup 🪄
  • Modify generics on replaced mappers inside `Controls` to cover more types. #11907
  • Use darc to get feeds for dependencies of build #11487
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [Windows] Changes in SwipeViewHandler #11229
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/controls 🎮, control-swipeview
  • [iOS] Fix Border Content clipping issues #10964
    t/bug, area/drawing ✏️, platform/iOS 🍎
  • [WinUI] Fix the size returned when measuring Frame #11779

  • [Android] Setup `Frame` with all of the missing `Mapper` methods #11804

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-12-07
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Exceptions not thrown, only if running with debugger #29791
  • The convention invocations have reached the recursion limit #29790
  • [Regression] Derived Entites not updated correctly since v7 #29789
  • InvalidOperationException on "Sub"-Including on keyless entities #29788

Closed

  • Invalid configuration when scaffolding a manytomany table with underscore in fieldname #29563
  • EF Core 7 AlterColumn generates an UPDATE in the SQL Server migration that can cause issues if the column is renamed in a subsequent migration #29780
  • .NET 7 - Internal CLR error (0x80131506) in dotnet ef cli #29769
  • Ef Core causes 'Access violation' when deleting Data that is tracked by ef core with ExecuteDeleteAsync #29743
  • dotnet-counters just show a row of numbers #29787
  • .NET 7 MigrateAsync() not working anymore #29786
  • Precompiled queries assume the model for a given DbContext will never change #13483
    8.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Implement EnsureDeleted for SQLite in-memory database #29794
  • [release/7.0] Scaffolding: Fix code for EF6 many-to-many pattern #29793
  • Clean up and document local DetectChanges behavior, plus other API doc fixes #29792

Merged

  • Throw if CompiledQuery is used with different models #29767

Updated

  • Increase maximum line length #29748
  • Reset query tracking behavior correctly if set on DbContextOptions #29766
  • Remove common property prefix navigation naming #29771
  • Updating SQLitePCLRaw library versions to 2.1.3 as it has ppc64le sup… #29783
  • [release/7.0] Fix making column required on SQL Server with idempotent migrations #29784
    Servicing-consider
  • Don't duplicate query filter parameters #29422

entry.title: dotnet/installer - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-12-07
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • Running tests without SDK? #15083

PullRequests

Created

  • Delete some test folders once run to not leave them on the machine #15094

Merged

  • improve format of productCommits file #15036
  • Simplify and fix test-template versions and variables #15100
  • Add a script for reproing VMR synchronization failures locally #15097
  • Fix triggers for the VMR CI #15096
